Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.GameObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Entity, Weapon
public class GameObject extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
Represents a basic game object with position, size, texture, and sprite information. Implements Disposable to clean up texture resources.

  • Constructor Summary
